doc.title: Colegas
doc.plot: Friends is a road movie that shows the simple things in life in a poetic light, through the eyes if 3 characters with Down syndrome who run away from the institution where they live, to gain their freedom. They are Marcio, Ritinha and Ariel. Three wonderful individuals who communicate using famous movie phrases. Result of the many years working at the school video library. With a stolen VW beetle they travel uncommon places in search of 3 simple wishes. Ariel wants to see the sea. Ritinha looks for someone to be her husband and Marcio needs to fly. In this wild search for their most intimate desires, they commit numerous harmless robberies. As if it was all just another movie.
